scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config api/config/config.js --seeders-path api/seeders && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config api/config/config.js --migrations-path api/migrations && npx sequelize-cli db:drop --config api/config/config.js && npx sequelize-cli db:create --config api/config/config.js && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config api/config/config.js --migrations-path api/migrations && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config api/config/config.js --seeders-path api/seeders
